ComicInfo.Title: Meifumadō
ComicInfo.Summary:
SECRET EMPIRE TIE-IN!
Deadpool trusts Steve Rogers implicitly. How could he not?
Now, it's time to put that trust to the test.
The result will have serious ramifications for Deadpool in days to come.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | David Lopez | 1 | Var | #SecretComic Variant Cover | Gerry Duggan (w), Scott Koblish (a), Guru-eFX (c) & Joe Sabino (l) | 2 |

ComicInfo.CoverArtist: David López, Gerry Duggan, Guru-eFX, Joe Sabino, Scott Koblish
ComicInfo.Characters: Captain America, Captain America (HYDRA), Deadpool, Phil Coulson
